Description: USED Epiphone Les Paul Standard PlusTop Pro (103) Physical ConditionThis Epiphone LP guitar is in good condition with only a few signs of use. The worst cosmetic flaws the guitar presents are some extremely light tarnishing about the chrome hardware and some light superficial scratches from typical handling and playing. (see photos)Overall, this guitar looks tremendous and sounds even better! FretwearThis guitar only has some minor wear on the first few frets. Plays great! ActionAction is medium low and plays great! Could possibly use a quick tweak to your liking! ElectronicsAll electronics work properly! CaseNo case or gig bag included! Weight9.0lbs Specifications from manufacturer: PRODUCT FEATURESEpiphone Les Paul Standard Plustop PRO At A GlanceTriple AAA Flame Veneer TopEpiphone ProBucker™ Humbuckers with Push/Pull Coil-TappingGrover™ Machine Heads with 18:1 tuning ratioAvailable in Blueberry Burst, Blood Orange, Greenburst, Honeyburst, Heritage Cherry Sunburst, Mojave Fade, Trans Blue SPECIFICATIONSBody Material MahoganyTop Material AAA Flame Maple VeneerNeck Material MahoganyNeck Shape 1960's SlimTaper™; D profileNeck Joint Glued InTruss Rod AdjustableScale Length 24.75"Fingerboard Material Pau Ferro with pearloid Trapezoid inlaysHeadstock Epiphone "Clipped Ear"; "Epiphone" logo in Pearloid "Les Paul Model" in Gold silkprintTruss Rod 2-Way AdjustableTruss Rod Cover 2-Ply (B/W); "Les Paul Standard PRO" in white silkprintNut Width U-Rite; CreamNeck Pickup Epiphone ProBucker-2™ ; 4-wireBridge Pickup Epiphone ProBucker-3™ ; 4-wireControls Epiphone All-metal 3-way Pickup Selector, Neck Pickup Volume with push/pull coil-tapping, Bridge Pickup Volume with push/pull coil-tapping, Neck Pickup Tone, Bridge Pickup ToneBinding Body Top - 1 ply (Cream), Fingerboard - 1 ply (Cream)Fingerboard Radius 12"Frets 22; medium-jumboBridge LockTone™ Tune-o-matic/StopbarNut Width 1-11/16"Hardware NickelMachine Heads Grover™ Tuners; 18:1 ratioOutput Jack Epiphone 1/4' Non-Rotating with Cream Jack PlatePickguard 1-Ply; Cream PVCControl Covers 1-Ply; PVCStrap Buttons Yes; 2Color Finishes Blueberry Burst (BL), Blood Orange (BO), Greenburst (GB), Honeyburst (HB), Heritage Cherry Sunburst (HS), Mojave Fade (MF), Trans Blue (TL)Optional Left-Handed (HS only), Hard Case (940-ENLPCS), Case UPC = 711106261591
